title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 29) (Road Safety Authority)
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Civil Law and Criminal Law 
(Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 29) (Road Safety Authority) 
(Meetings of Board) (Designation) Order 2020. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 12 November 2020.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited civil law criminal law (miscellaneous provisions) act 2020 (section 29) (road safety authority) (meetings board) (designation) order 2020 (2) order come operation 12 november 2020

title: (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020 (Section 29) (Road Safety Authority)
heading: 2. A meeting of the Board of Road Safety Authority is designated for the
text_raw:
2. A meeting of the Board of Road Safety Authority is designated for the 
purposes of section 29 of the Civil Law and Criminal Law (Miscellaneous 
Provisions) Act 2020 (No. 13 of 2020). 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

11 November, 2020. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 17th November, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [520] 3
